request.description: Delete a document and all its associated files
Get study notes for a specific document

response.name: Success
response.body:
{
    "study_notes": [
        {
            "id": 1,
            "document_id": 1,
            "content": "Key Concepts and Terminology:

1. Machine Learning:
- Definition: A subset of artificial intelligence that enables systems to learn and improve from experience
- Core components: Data, Algorithms, Training, Evaluation

2. Types of Machine Learning:
- Supervised Learning: Learning from labeled data
- Unsupervised Learning: Finding patterns in unlabeled data
- Reinforcement Learning: Learning through interaction with environment

3. Common Algorithms:
- Linear Regression
- Decision Trees
- Neural Networks
- Support Vector Machines

Practical Applications:
1. Image Recognition
2. Natural Language Processing
3. Recommendation Systems
4. Fraud Detection",
            "summary": "This section provides a comprehensive introduction to machine learning, covering its fundamental concepts, different types of learning approaches, and practical applications in various fields.",
            "created_at": "2024-03-20T12:00:00.000000Z",
            "updated_at": "2024-03-20T12:00:00.000000Z"
        }
    ]
}

response.name: Success
response.body:
{
    "message": "Quiz generated successfully",
    "quiz": {
        "id": 1,
        "document_id": 1,
        "title": "Machine Learning Basics Quiz",
        "type": "multiple_choice",
        "total_questions": 10,
        "created_at": "2024-03-20T12:00:00.000000Z",
        "updated_at": "2024-03-20T12:00:00.000000Z",
        "questions": [
            {
                "id": 1,
                "quiz_id": 1,
                "question": "What is the main goal of supervised learning?",
                "type": "multiple_choice",
                "options": [
                    "To learn from labeled data and make predictions",
                    "To find patterns in unlabeled data",
                    "To learn through trial and error",
                    "To cluster similar data points"
                ],
                "correct_answer": "To learn from labeled data and make predictions",
                "explanation": "Supervised learning uses labeled training data to learn patterns and make predictions on new, unseen data."
            }
        ]
    }
}
